title: Update Contact Us section with real phone and email details

requirements.summary: Replace placeholder contact information with real phone number '9719774964' and email 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com' in ContactSection and Footer components
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact Us section displays the phone number '9719774964' in the phone contact info card.
The Contact Us section displays the email 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com' in the email contact info card.
The Footer component displays the same phone number '9719774964' and email 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com' in its contact details area.
No placeholder or dummy contact information remains visible anywhere on the page.

file_operations.description: Update the phone contact info card to display '9719774964' and the email contact info card to display 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com', replacing any existing placeholder values. Preserve all existing layout, styling, icons, and structure of the contact info cards.

Update the contact details area in the footer to display the phone number '9719774964' and email 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com', replacing any existing placeholder values. Maintain all existing footer layout, quick links, services list, and styling.
